messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/9/2002 5:15:06 AM Central Standard Time, ... Just a thought..........Would you have to pay for what you don t use...... What if there was
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/9/2002 5:15:06 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> I have considered it and I may talk to my dh about him not going back after
> Christmas break. But we will still owe for the tuition and the curriculum
> for the year at the school

Just a thought..........Would you have to pay for what you don't use......

What if there was no money to pay it.......you wouldn't be able to go .......

Just rambling.......

Kim


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
